name: yappatron
description: always-on voice dictation for mac. no hotkeys. no toggles. just talk.

features.title: always listening
features.body: No push-to-talk. Start talking, words appear. Stop talking, it waits.

features.title: 160ms latency
features.body: Real-time streaming. Characters appear as you speak.

features.title: fully local
features.body: All processing on-device. No cloud. Your words never leave your machine.

features.title: neural engine
features.body: Runs on Apple Silicon ANE. Efficient, not draining your battery.

steps.label: streaming ASR
steps.detail: 160ms chunks fed to Parakeet model on Neural Engine

steps.label: ghost text
steps.detail: partials stream into focused input with live corrections

steps.label: end of utterance
steps.detail: model detects you're done, optionally presses enter

terminal.text: hello world this is me talking naturally
